title.narrative: Preparing, equipping and operating the Artificial Limbs and Rehabilitation Center in Sayun Governorate

description.narrative: 1- Providing physical rehabilitation services for people with special needs, following them up and making use of them in community service 2 - Raise the capabilities of the medical and technical staff professionally and scientifically, and prepare them to deal with specific cases 3- Limiting the migration of specialized medical and technical personnel 4- Settling and improving prosthetic limb services and rehabilitation 5- Helping people with special needs by engaging in social life and maintaining the continuity of their performance within the elements of civil society 6- Upgrading the capabilities of the workers at the Artificial Limbs Center with the latest medical sciences.

1- The willingness of the Artificial Limbs Center to provide its services to (1100) beneficiaries 2- Raising the efficiency of the Artificial Limbs and Rehabilitation Center, in order to achieve the sustainability of its services, and meet the needs for the manufacture and installation of (240) new limbs 3- Rehabilitation, follow-up and repair for (860) injured and sick patients 4- Providing the center's services to (1100) beneficiaries 5- Enabling the number of (38) medical, technical and administrative staff to take up jobs in the center.
Preparing and securing medical and non-medical equipment, and securing medical and non-medical needs and supplies for the prosthetic center and operating it.
